021import net.tnemc.core.EconomyManager;
022import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
023import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
024import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.HoldingsEntry;
025import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.modify.HoldingsModifier;
026import net.tnemc.core.actions.ActionSource;
027import net.tnemc.core.api.callback.transaction.PostTransactionCallback;
028import net.tnemc.core.manager.TransactionManager;
029import net.tnemc.core.utils.exceptions.InvalidTransactionException;
030import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
031import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.log.DebugLevel;
032
033import java.math.BigDecimal;
034import java.util.List;
035import java.util.Optional;
036import java.util.UUID;
037import java.util.function.Consumer;
038
039/**
040 * Represents a financial transaction.
041 *
042 * @author creatorfromhell
043 * @since 0.1.2.0
044 */
045public class Transaction {
046
047  private final String type;
048  private TransactionProcessor processor;
049  private ActionSource source;
050
051  private TransactionParticipant from;
052  private TransactionParticipant to;
053  private HoldingsModifier modifierTo;
054  private HoldingsModifier modifierFrom;
055
056  private boolean admin;
057  private boolean track;
058
059  private Consumer<TransactionResult> resultConsumer;
060
061  public Transaction(final String type) {
062
063    this.type = type;
064
065    this.processor = EconomyManager.baseProcessor();
066  }
067
068  /**
069   * Used to create a new Transaction object from the specified transaction type.
070   *
071   * @param type The identifier of the transaction type.
072   *
073   * @return An instance of the Transaction object created with the specified type.
074   */
075  public static Transaction of(final String type) {
076
077    return new Transaction(type);
078  }
079
080  /**
081   * Used to determine if the "to" participant is losing funds in this transaction.
082   *
083   * @return True if the "to" participant is losing funds, otherwise false.
084   */
085  public boolean isToLosing() {
086
087    return to != null && modifierTo != null && modifierTo.isRemoval();
088  }
089
090  /**
091   * Used to determine if the "from" participant is losing funds in this transaction.
092   *
093   * @return True if the "from" participant is losing funds, otherwise false.
094   */
095  public boolean isFromLosing() {
096
097    return from != null && modifierFrom.isRemoval();
098  }
099
100  /**
101   * Used to set the {@link TransactionParticipant from} participant.
102   *
103   * @param id       The identifier of this participant.
104   * @param modifier The {@link HoldingsModifier modifier} associated with this participant.
105   *
106   * @return An instance of the Transaction object with the new participant.
107   */
108  public Transaction from(final UUID id, final HoldingsModifier modifier) {
109
110    final Optional<Account> account = TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(id);
111    account.ifPresent(value->from(value, modifier));
112    return this;
113  }
114
115  /**
116   * Used to set the {@link TransactionParticipant from} participant.
117   *
118   * @param account  The account reference of this participant.
119   * @param modifier The {@link HoldingsModifier modifier} associated with this participant.
120   *
121   * @return An instance of the Transaction object with the new participant.
122   */
123  public Transaction from(final Account account, final HoldingsModifier modifier) {
124
125    final List<HoldingsEntry> balances = account.getHoldings(modifier.getRegion(), modifier.getCurrency(), modifier.getType());
126
127    if(balances.isEmpty()) {
128      balances.add(new HoldingsEntry(modifier.getRegion(), modifier.getCurrency(),
129                                     BigDecimal.ZERO, EconomyManager.NORMAL));
130    }
131
132    this.from = new TransactionParticipant(account.getIdentifier(), balances);
133
134    final Optional<TransactionType> type = TNECore.eco().transaction().findType(this.type);
135
136    final BigDecimal tax = (type.isPresent() && type.get().fromTax().isPresent())? type.get().fromTax().get()
137            .calculateTax(modifier.getModifier()) : BigDecimal.ZERO;
138
139    BigDecimal working = null;
140    final boolean take = (modifier.getModifier().compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) < 0);
141
142    if(take) {
143      if(modifier.isPercent()) {
144
145        BigDecimal total = BigDecimal.ZERO;
146        for(final HoldingsEntry entry : balances) {
147          total = total.add(entry.getAmount());
148        }
149        working = modifier.modify(total);
150        total = null;
151      } else {
152        working = modifier.getModifier().multiply(new BigDecimal(-1));
153      }
154    }
155
156    boolean done = false;
157
158    for(int i = 0; i < balances.size(); i++) {
159      final HoldingsEntry entry = balances.get(i);
160      final HoldingsEntry ending;
161
162      PluginCore.log().debug("entry bal: " + entry.getAmount().toPlainString(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
163      PluginCore.log().debug("entry bal: " + entry.getRegion(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
164
165      if(!done) {
166        if(!take) {
167
168          ending = entry.modifyGrab(modifier).modifyGrab(tax.negate());
169
170          PluginCore.log().debug("End: " + ending.getAmount().toPlainString(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
171          PluginCore.log().debug("End: " + ending.getRegion(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
172          done = true;
173        } else {
174
175          PluginCore.log().debug("Working: " + working.toPlainString(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
176
177          if(entry.getAmount().compareTo(working) >= 0) {
178            PluginCore.log().debug("Value: " + working.toPlainString(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
179
180            ending = entry.modifyGrab(working.multiply(new BigDecimal(-1))).modifyGrab(tax.negate());
181            PluginCore.log().debug("break out since we are good to go with this entry", DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
182            done = true;
183          } else {
184
185            if(i == (balances.size() - 1)) {
186              ending = entry.modifyGrab(working.multiply(new BigDecimal(-1)));
187
188            } else {
189              PluginCore.log().debug("Keep Working", DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
190              ending = entry.modifyGrab(entry.getAmount().multiply(new BigDecimal(-1)));
191              working = working.subtract(entry.getAmount());
192            }
193          }
194        }
195      } else {
196        ending = entry;
197      }
198      this.from.getEndingBalances().add(ending);
199    }
200
201    working = null;
202
203    this.from.setTax(tax);
204
205    this.modifierFrom = modifier;
206    return this;
207  }
208
209  /**
210   * Used to set the {@link TransactionParticipant to} participant.
211   *
212   * @param id       The identifier of this participant.
213   * @param modifier The {@link HoldingsModifier modifier} associated with this participant.
214   *
215   * @return An instance of the Transaction object with the new participant.
216   */
217  public Transaction to(final UUID id, final HoldingsModifier modifier) {
218
219    final Optional<Account> account = TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(id);
220    account.ifPresent(value->to(value, modifier));
221    return this;
222  }
223
224  /**
225   * Used to set the {@link TransactionParticipant to} participant.
226   *
227   * @param account  The account reference of this participant.
228   * @param modifier The {@link HoldingsModifier modifier} associated with this participant.
229   *
230   * @return An instance of the Transaction object with the new participant.
231   */
232  public Transaction to(final Account account, final HoldingsModifier modifier) {
233
234    final List<HoldingsEntry> balances = account.getHoldings(modifier.getRegion(), modifier.getCurrency(), modifier.getType());
235
236    if(balances.isEmpty()) {
237      balances.add(new HoldingsEntry(modifier.getRegion(), modifier.getCurrency(),
238                                     BigDecimal.ZERO, EconomyManager.NORMAL));
239    }
240
241    this.to = new TransactionParticipant(account.getIdentifier(), balances);
242
243    final Optional<TransactionType> type = TNECore.eco().transaction().findType(this.type);
244
245    final BigDecimal tax = (type.isPresent() && type.get().toTax().isPresent())? type.get().toTax().get()
246            .calculateTax(modifier.getModifier()) : BigDecimal.ZERO;
247
248    BigDecimal working = null;
249    final boolean take = (modifier.getModifier().compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) < 0);
250
251    if(take) {
252      if(modifier.isPercent()) {
253
254        BigDecimal total = BigDecimal.ZERO;
255        for(final HoldingsEntry entry : balances) {
256          total = total.add(entry.getAmount());
257        }
258        working = modifier.modify(total);
259        total = null;
260      } else {
261        working = modifier.getModifier().multiply(new BigDecimal(-1));
262      }
263    }
264
265    boolean done = false;
266
267    for(int i = 0; i < balances.size(); i++) {
268      final HoldingsEntry entry = balances.get(i);
269      final HoldingsEntry ending;
270
271      PluginCore.log().debug("entry bal: " + entry.getAmount().toPlainString(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
272      PluginCore.log().debug("entry bal: " + entry.getRegion(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
273
274      //TODO Test this.
275      if(done) break;
276
277      if(!done) {
278        if(!take) {
279
280          ending = entry.modifyGrab(modifier).modifyGrab(tax.negate());
281
282          PluginCore.log().debug("End: " + ending.getAmount().toPlainString(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
283          PluginCore.log().debug("End: " + ending.getRegion(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
284          done = true;
285        } else {
286
287          PluginCore.log().debug("Working: " + working.toPlainString(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
288
289          if(entry.getAmount().compareTo(working) >= 0) {
290            PluginCore.log().debug("Value: " + working.toPlainString(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
291
292            ending = entry.modifyGrab(working.multiply(new BigDecimal(-1))).modifyGrab(tax.negate());
293            PluginCore.log().debug("break out since we are good to go with this entry", DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
294            done = true;
295          } else {
296
297            if(i == (balances.size() - 1)) {
298              ending = entry.modifyGrab(working.multiply(new BigDecimal(-1)));
299
300            } else {
301              PluginCore.log().debug("Keep Working", DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
302              ending = entry.modifyGrab(entry.getAmount().multiply(new BigDecimal(-1)));
303              working = working.subtract(entry.getAmount());
304            }
305          }
306        }
307      } else {
308        ending = entry;
309      }
310      this.to.getEndingBalances().add(ending);
311    }
312
313    working = null;
314
315    this.to.setTax(tax);
316
317    this.modifierTo = modifier;
318    return this;
319  }
320
321  /**
322   * Used to set {@link ActionSource source} of this transaction.
323   *
324   * @param source The {@link ActionSource source} of this transaction.
325   *
326   * @return An instance of the Transaction object with the new {@link ActionSource source}.
327   */
328  public Transaction source(final ActionSource source) {
329
330    this.source = source;
331    return this;
332  }
333
334  /**
335   * Used to set this as an administrator performed transaction. This allows it to override certain
336   * things such as account statuses.
337   *
338   * @param admin If this transaction is an administrator transaction or not.
339   *
340   * @return An instance of the Transaction object with the new {@link ActionSource source}.
341   */
342  public Transaction admin(final boolean admin) {
343
344    this.admin = admin;
345    return this;
346  }
347
348  /**
349   * Used to set {@link TransactionProcessor processor} of this transaction.
350   *
351   * @param processor The {@link TransactionProcessor processor} of this transaction.
352   *
353   * @return An instance of the Transaction object with the new
354   * {@link TransactionProcessor processor}.
355   */
356  public Transaction processor(final TransactionProcessor processor) {
357
358    this.processor = processor;
359    return this;
360  }
361
362  /**
363   * Processes the transaction and sends the result to the
364   * {@link Transaction#resultConsumer Result Handler}.
365   *
366   * @throws InvalidTransactionException If all required aspects of the transaction are not
367   *                                     present.
368   */
369  public void process(final Consumer<TransactionResult> resultConsumer) throws InvalidTransactionException {
370
371    this.resultConsumer = resultConsumer;
372
373    process();
374  }
375
376  /**
377   * Processes the transaction and sends the result to the
378   * {@link Transaction#resultConsumer Result Handler}.
379   *
380   * @throws InvalidTransactionException If all required aspects of the transaction are not
381   *                                     present.
382   */
383  public TransactionResult process() throws InvalidTransactionException {
384
385    String missing = null;
386
387    if(this.type == null) {
388      missing = "Transaction Type";
389    }
390
391    if(this.processor == null) {
392      missing = "Transaction Processor";
393    }
394
395    if(this.to == null && this.from == null) {
396      missing = "Both Transaction Parties";
397    }
398
399    if(missing != null) {
400      throw new InvalidTransactionException(missing);
401    }
402
403    final TransactionResult result = processor.process(this);
404
405    if(resultConsumer != null) {
406      resultConsumer.accept(result);
407    }
408
409    final PostTransactionCallback postTransaction = new PostTransactionCallback(result);
410    PluginCore.callbacks().call(postTransaction);
411
412    //Log our stuff.
413    if(result.getReceipt().isPresent()) {
414
415      TransactionManager.receipts().log(result.getReceipt().get());
416
417      if(to != null) {
418        to.asAccount().ifPresent((acc->acc.logReference(result.getReceipt().get())));
419      }
420
421      if(from != null) {
422        from.asAccount().ifPresent((acc->acc.logReference(result.getReceipt().get())));
423      }
424    }
425
426    return result;
427  }
428
429  public Optional<Account> getFromAccount() {
430
431    if(from != null) {
432      return TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(from.getId());
433    }
434
435    return Optional.empty();
436  }
437
438  public Optional<Account> getToAccount() {
439
440    if(to != null) {
441      return TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(to.getId());
442    }
443
444    return Optional.empty();
445  }
446
447  public TransactionProcessor getProcessor() {
448
449    return processor;
450  }
451
452  public String getType() {
453
454    return type;
455  }
456
457  public ActionSource getSource() {
458
459    return source;
460  }
461
462  public TransactionParticipant getFrom() {
463
464    return from;
465  }
466
467  public TransactionParticipant getTo() {
468
469    return to;
470  }
471
472  public HoldingsModifier getModifierTo() {
473
474    return modifierTo;
475  }
476
477  public HoldingsModifier getModifierFrom() {
478
479    return modifierFrom;
480  }
481
482  public boolean isAdmin() {
483
484    return admin;
485  }
486
487  public boolean isTrack() {
488
489    return track;
490  }
491
492  public void setTrack(final boolean track) {
493
494    this.track = track;
495  }
496
497  public Consumer<TransactionResult> getResultConsumer() {
498
499    return resultConsumer;
500  }
501}
